name: Brazil Cup Flick Football Striker: Penalty Shoot Out
name_original: Brazil Cup Flick Football Striker: Penalty Shoot Out
description:
Have you ever dreamed of becoming world’s greatest football superstar?

And do you want to know how it feels to be one?

Then dream no more! This game will make you feel like one of the pros!

Shoot 10 or as many goals as you can before the time runs out. Concentrate on the direction you want to strike the ball then shoot.
Shoot from various directions to confuse the goal keeper and score goals!

UNLEASH the striker in you!

Features:
-Leaderboard
-3 different game modes(Easy, Medium and Hard)
-Easy control (good for all ages)
